forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 52. Southwest wind around 10 mph.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 8 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

weather_report:
The dawn whispers a gentle promise to San Francisco, as the city awakens under a partly cloudy sky. The air carries a crisp bite, settling at a cool 52 degrees, and a soft southwest breeze teases through the streets, offering a refreshing caress. As the sun stretches over the horizon, it bathes the city in a warm glow, hinting at the day ahead. Expect mostly sunny skies, where the afternoon will gently coax temperatures down to around 60, softened by a westerly wind that may sway in between 8 to 17 mph, occasionally punctuated by eager gusts.

Today, the fog plays coy, lingering just enough to veil distant sights, yet it promises to clear as the sun climbs higher. A faint marine layer may still cling to the bay, particularly near the Golden Gate, creating a picturesque tableau where land meets sea in a subtle dance of clouds and blue. Best to layer lightly; a long-sleeve shirt or a light jacket will suffice as you traverse the city, navigating the inviting parks or enjoying a quiet moment at a local café. As the day unfolds with an inviting warmth, perhaps take a leisurely stroll through the Botanical Gardens or find solace in one of the city’s vibrant neighborhoods, where the charm of everyday life ebbs and flows beneath the soft, watchful sun.
